attributes.action: Build A41 bypass for Aylesbury now
attributes.additional_details: Before the 20,000 new homes are completed in the Aylesbury area, infrastructure should be in place to relieve the current road system from ever increasing traffic levels. For 30 years there has been talk of a bypass for Aylesbury. At the time of the Aston Clinton bypass, construction should have continued around the town with an additional spurs into the town and onwards to Bicester. The longer the government procrastinates a by-pass will become too difficult because of the town's development.
